summary: adds 4 weapons (each in 6 different colors) to the game from Weapons of the Third Era MoS edition.
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds 4 (or 24, however you want to put it) weapons to the game from Weapons of the Third Era \"edit:ORIGINAL\" and they can all be crafted in any forge. This is my somewhat my first mod for skyrim.

There are 2 secret weapons in the game with special enchantments on them, for the fun of sport im going to only give you hints as to where they are. One is shoved into a word wall (outside if that helps) and the other is on the highest peak of skyrim.

COLORS:
red, blue ,green, gold, yellow ,purple

CREDITS:
747823 and masterofshadows

INSTALLATION:
Dragon and drop all the files into the data folder. the .bsa is optional and goes in the skyrim folder.

KNOWN ISSUES:
~missing textures, reinstall the mod or get masterofshadows mod, both will work.
~A fight with alduin or the other dragons at the end of game knocks the 2nd secret weapon off the cliff face.

if there are any bugs you see let me know and ill see what i can do about it :P thanks

Quick Note: this mod is not a variant of the MoS edition, its coming from the original, just wanted to clear that up ;)
author: Boldpaste2
